text: Doanesburgh is an extinct locality in Putnam County, in the U.S. state of New York. A post office called Doanesburgh was established in 1839, and remained in operation until 1855. The community was named after Benjamin Doane, an early settler. ==See also== * Old Southeast Church (Brewster, New York) ==References== Category:Ghost towns in New York (state) Category:Landforms of Putnam County, New York
title: Doanesburgh, New York
